name: io::buffered::bufwriter::BufWriter::<W>::flush_buf::BufGuard::<'a>::done

alloc_crate::vec::Vec::<T, A>::len.doc:
Returns the number of elements in the vector, also referred to
 as its 'length'.

 # Examples

 ```
 let a = vec![1, 2, 3];
 assert_eq!(a.len(), 3);
 ```

doc: true if all of the bytes have been written
